channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Good Morning Britain
channel.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Lorraine
channel.desc: Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz glamour as well as the latest fashion, food and celebrity gossip.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: This Morning
channel.desc: Magazine show with news and topical items, celebrity guests, expert advice, real-life stories, competitions and a mix of cookery, health, beauty, lifestyle and more.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Loose Women
channel.desc: Join the Loose Women panellists as they interview celebrity guests and discuss the day's most topical issues, from current affairs to celebrity gossip and the latest showbiz news.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Antony Cotton, Matt Dawson, and Stacey Dooley all trying to 'say what they see' in aid of charity.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Lingo
channel.desc: Looking to spell success are mother and son Becka and Connor from Johnstone, mother and son Sylvia and Ishmail from Kent, and Sunderland-based Tinashe and wife Princess.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: All that stands between Richard from Birmingham, Jackie from East Kilbride, Emma from Hitchin, Lee from Ilkeston and thousands of pounds is the small matter of a Chaser.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: UEFA Women's Euro
channel.desc: Coverage of a semi-final match at the UEFA Women's Euro 2025 tournament.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Heathrow
channel.desc: The iconic Boeing 747 is flying out of Heathrow for the last time in this episode as plane spotters around the world hope to bid it a fond farewell.
